post.body: it's just for an article, not a job or anything. but hell yeah i'd move there, someday.
for an article about handmade gifts/the economy? i posted in a forum.. once. we'll see.
maybe her dead boyfriend is a vampire?
RIGHT? i'm fucking freezing! i'm wearing like four tops and three pairs of pants :(
i saw a pair of old man twins today and they were dressed identically. it was amazing.
no, i went straight to bed, but could only sleep a few hours. it'll be nap time soon.
ny times wants to interview me? crazyyyy.
everyone i'm following on twitter is watching heroes right now. i am too!
I BETTER NOT BE GETTING SICK
it's peanut butter jelly time
also, my cobrasnake debut? i am awesome at hiding my face.
cringing at the thought of my behavior around greenwald last night. ha!
why am i not still asleep?
happy xmas (war is over). please enjoy this small guitar.
My flight is delayed until 1:15am? That is such bullshit!
playing dress up (aka figuring out what to pack) isn't nearly as fun while sick :(
yucky, i think i'm calling in sick.
AVOIDING THE OFFICE PARTY!
errrr, i hope i didn't come off as a total moron to that nyt reporter.
watching DSM and i'm so lost! did i miss an episode... or three?
mmmm reese's peanut butter cups. these might be the only thing keeping me from actual veganism.
